Belgium:
The Charter of Kortenberg finalised at Kortenberg Abbey, establishing fundamental rights for the inhabitants of the Duchy of Brabant such as no punishment without due process. Council of four knights and ten representatives of the boroughs established (beginnings of representative institutions in the duchy).
John II, Duke of Brabant, dies; succeeded by John III
Nepal: Newar king Ripu Malla leads raid in Kathmandu Valley
